sentences.en: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.cn: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.en: "Golly," he says, "Isn't it exciting!"
sentences.cn: “天哪！”他说，“这真让人激动！”

sentences.en: an exciting discovery
sentences.cn: 激动人心的发现

sentences.en: Gillespie's goal set the scene for an exciting second half.
sentences.cn: 吉莱斯皮的进球为下半场的精彩比赛铺平了道路。

sentences.en: He thinks pop music today is as exciting as it's ever been.
sentences.cn: 他认为现今的流行音乐与以往一样令人兴奋。

sentences.en: His achievements, though hardly exciting, were widely admired.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的成就不怎么激动人心，可依然备受赞赏。

sentences.en: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.cn: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.en: It'san exciting opportunity to learn what goes on behind the scenes.
sentences.cn: 可以有机会了解幕后的工作，令人非常兴奋。

sentences.en: Jackie was an exciting player to watch.
sentences.cn: 看杰基打球很刺激。

sentences.en: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.cn: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.en: London's musical life might become as exciting as Berlin's.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的音乐生活可能会变得像柏林的一样令人兴奋。

sentences.en: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.cn: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

sentences.en: Nikolai Demidenko gave an exciting yet poetic performance.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉·杰米坚科的表演激动人心且富有诗意。

sentences.en: St Peters-burg's night life ranks as more exciting than the capital's.
sentences.cn: 圣彼得堡的夜生活比首都的更刺激。

sentences.en: The chase is always much more exciting than the conquest anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，追求的过程总比得手更为刺激。

sentences.en: Their films are exciting and really stretch the imagination.
sentences.cn: 他们的电影非常精彩且发人深省。

sentences.en: These prizes are just for starters. Other exciting offers are flooding in.
sentences.cn: 这些奖只是个开始。其他激动人心的奖励还会接踵而至。

sentences.en: We're sure you'll find it exciting!
sentences.cn: 我们保证你一定会认为这很刺激的！

sentences.en: Wind surfing can be strenuous but immensely exciting.
sentences.cn: 风帆冲浪可能紧张吃力，但却非常刺激。

sentences.en: Working abroad should be an exciting and positive experience for all concerned.
sentences.cn: 在海外工作对所有相关人员来说都应该是一段让人兴奋而愉快的经历。
